backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Defines feature evidence entries linking features to related source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for key frontend files describing their roles in routing, UI, and business logic.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base definitions with OKLCH color variables and dark mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entrypoint mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with layout and routes for all main pages.
frontend/src/components/CustomerOrderPro: Shows the current step of the customer order flow with labeled progress indicators.
frontend/src/components/DishImageModal.t: Modal component for displaying an enlarged dish image with dismiss controls.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders project footer text, thank‑you message, attribution link, and copyright.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Navigation header with desktop and mobile menus using TanStack Router navigation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching when identity changes.
Manages the four‑step customer order process, including cart, menu items, delivery details, and order progression.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrderTracking.ts: Implements timed order status progression with start, reset, and current status tracking logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file exporting nothing for future query logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS layers and custom theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutProject.tsx: Displays an overview of the project with feature cards and descriptive sections.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerPortal.tsx: Implements the customer ordering flow with menu browsing, cart steps, form entry, image modal, and order tracking.
frontend/src/pages/DeliveryPortal.tsx: Provides a UI-only delivery partner dashboard with login and delivery status management.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Home page showing hero text and three portal cards that navigate to customer, restaurant, and delivery sections.
frontend/src/pages/RestaurantPortal.tsx: Restaurant dashboard with a mock login, sample orders, and controls to accept or reject orders.
frontend/src/pages/Technologies.tsx: Page displaying categorized lists of frontend, backend, database, and tooling technologies with icons and descriptions.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom colors, container settings, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, requirements, known issues, and planned UI flow for the food ordering system.
